summary: This is my 1st mod. It is a small increase to the stats of some of the daedric artifacts to make them slightly better than the vanilla daedric weapons (ex. Dawnbreaker is now stronger than daedric sword). Dragon bone is now slightly better than daedric armor and Wuuthrad is slightly better than daedric battleaxe. In addition, there is now a katana
descriptionHtml:
This is my 1st mod. It is a small increase to the stats of some of the daedric artifacts to make them slightly better than the vanilla daedric weapons (ex. Dawnbreaker is now stronger than daedric sword). Dragon bone is now slightly better than daedric armor and Wuuthrad is slightly better than daedric battleaxe. In addition, there is now a katana called Lifedrinker on the floor in Breezehome with a drain health, magicka, and stamina enchantment.

Lifedrinker: base damage= 15 enchantment=keening
Wuuthrad: base damage= 30
Dawnbreaker: base damage= 15
Ebony Blade: base damage= 25
Mace of Malog Bal: base damage= 20
Mehrune\'s Razor: base damage= 12
Volendrung: base damage= 30
The Rueful Axe: base damage= 25

Dragonbone Boots: armor rating= 20
Dragonbone Armor: armor rating= 50
Dragonbone Gauntlets: armor rating= 17
Dragonbone Helmet: armor rating= 22
Dragonbone Shield: armor rating= 35

Dragonscale Boots: armor rating= 15
Dragonscale Armor: armor rating= 45
Dragonscale Gauntlets: armor rating= 12
Dragonscale Helmet: armor rating= 17
Dragonscale Shield: armor rating= 30

Again, this is my first mod. I am open to feedback but keep it constructive and please be civil.
author: cskarr
